summary: A chronicle of the interaction between college student Jason Moss and the object of his obsession, serial killer John Wayne Gacy.
cast: William Forsythe|Jesse Moss|Emma Lahana|Cole Heppell|Belinda Metz|Michael Ryan|Eric Keenleyside|Daryl Shuttleworth|Patrick Gilmore|Andrew Airlie|Michael Kopsa|Jeffrey Bowyer-Chapman|Hunter Elliott|Michaela Mann|Dee Jay Jackson|Libby Osler|Brett Dier|James Ralph|Jaren Brandt Bartlett|Lynn Colliar|Richard Harmon|Andrea Brooks|Anthony Shim|Karissa Tynes|Josh Goring|Kai Kennedy|John Andrew Vaas
keywords: school lecture|opening letters|opening mail|mother son relationship|brother brother relationship
title: En la mente de un asesino en serie
